result.execSummary:
The defendant Tazia L. Miron was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct - County/Municipality [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse]. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: All court obligations shall be paid directly to Clerk of Court.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Tazia L. Miron

records.addlTxt: Defendant Tazia L. Miron in court.  Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Ryan Kieler in court for Tazia L. Miron. State moves to amend charge to an ordinance. State will be recommending $100 fine plus court costs and domestic abuse surcharge. Court grants amendment. Defendant pleads no contest. Court accepts plea and finds defendant guilty. Court orders $100 fine plus court cost and domestic abuse surcharge.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Tazia L. Miron appeared by video, Attorney Ryan Kieler for Tazia L. Miron appeared in court, Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. for State of Wisconsin appeared in court. Defendant requests reading. Court reads criminal complaints. Defendant pleads not guilty to charge. Court discusses attorney fee payment and gave instructions to contact JA to set up wage assignment. Status date set.
Status conference scheduled for May 11, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Jury trial scheduled for May 24, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Jury trial scheduled for May 31, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on May 11, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
cc: defendant 3/15/22 SH; no wage assignment on file; to pay direct to COC 3/18/22 SH

Arraignment on March 21, 2022 at 10:30 am.

You may join this hearing by video using the following website: https://wicourts.zoom.us/j/600348151 (meeting ID: 600-348-151).  To appear by video, you will need a web camera and microphone.  If you are unable to join by internet using video, you may join the hearing by phone by calling 1-312-626-6799 (meeting ID: 600-348-151). If you wish to appear in person, please contact Judge VanDeHey's Judicial Assistant at (608) 723-7826.

Defendant Tazia L. Miron appeared in court, Attorney Anthony Joseph Pozorski Sr. for State of Wisconsin appeared in court. Court explains charges, penalties, and right to counsel. Defendant referred to SPD. Defendant is currently employed. State requests signature bond. Court orders $1000 signature bond with a condition to go to SPD office today. Arraignment date set.
